## \_Array.max property

Find the largest number in an array, if the array is empty the return is -Infinity.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static readonly max: typeof arrayMax;
```

## Remarks

See [arrayMax()](./rc-js-util.arraymax.md)<!-- -->.
